DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; SPOTLIGHT ; JUST ANOTHER GAME ?
DOC.TEXT: Brazilian Coach Carlos Alberto Parreira said his team will not approach the July 4 game against the United States any differently . " We will approach the opponent we ' re going to play like any other , " Parreira said after Tuesday night ' s game against Sweden . " If you reached the final 16 , you did so on merit. " Dunga , a Brazilian midfielder , was a bit more forthcoming . " They ' re a little bit of Europe , a little bit South_American , " he said of the U.S. playing style . " They take good care of the ball . They ' re not a team that just sends the ball mindlessly up the field. " CHRIS DUFRESNE
